name: Gigantic Megafauna Companion
summary: The mammoths and other megafauna ridden by your people are larger than any ordinary beast.
description:
The mammoths and other megafauna ridden by your people are larger than any ordinary beast. Your megafauna companion increases in size to Huge but doesn't otherwise change its statistics.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
